name: The Eurovision Game
description:
Your friend invited you to watch Eurovision at his place, but you HATE this show. Keep your cool as long as you can by looking away from the TV and drinking, but beware! Drinking at the wrong time or being caught looking away will make your friend angry...

  • Left arrow: watch TV
  • Upper arrow: drink
  • Right arrow: look away
Art and game design: Emilie Mavel Programming and Eurovision consulting: Dion Christensen
